```{r}
ggplot(data = cdc, mapping = aes(x = age))+
  geom_histogram(color = "red" , fill = "white",binwidth = 2) +
  geom_freqpoly(color = "black", size = 1,binwidth = 2) +
  
facet_grid(genhlth ~ smoke100)
```
